title: Lagging currently playing from SEA( Phillippines ) to OCE  ( 280ms )
body:
Im lagging. but a long time ago i saw my friend play on OCE server and he had 120 ping or less. now i tried playing it and my ping is 280 or higher why please help


//sorry for my bad english =)

replies.body:
Hi,

One of the main fibre links between OCE and SEA has been cut, meaning internet traffic is taking a less optimal paths than normal.

Once it gets fixed, ping will likely go back to normal levels.  It might take some time, as a ship needs to go out and fix the cut cable.

Cheers
Mindstar
